briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Fermented Barley on Decrement of Body Fat in Obese Subjects

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* an age from 19 to 70 years,
* a BMI(Body Mass Index) \>23 kg/m\^2,
* an LDL-C(Low Density Lipoprotein-cholesterol) concentration between 110 and 250 mg/dL

Exclusion Criteria:

* they had heart disease, liver or kidney disease, food allergies, daily exercise habits, a body weight increase or decrease \>10 kg in the previous 3 months, irregular lifestyle habits
* they took medication and functional foods known to affect lipid metabolism.

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Body Fat Mass(kg)
outcomeMeasures.description: Body fat mass(kg) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Visceral Adipose Tissue
outcomeMeasures.description: Visceral adipose tissue was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.description: LDL-C (LDL Low Density Lipoprotein-cholesterol) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.description: HDL-C(High Density Lipoprotein-cholesterol) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).
